sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useCart } from "react-use-cart"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import startersData from "./Data"; import { loadStripe } from "@stripe/stripe-js"; import axios from 'axios'; import { Component } from "react"; const stripePromise=loadStripe("pk_test_51K930USIBemfDVs67OkpVUsU7thyoJxIraC6HDkybouD5r8V8jtj4PaGAw4Wii2vOW0etNR2wTUiQ60rMVbiUvTx00nQZNZspN"); function Cart(){ console.log(stripePromise); const [branch, setBranch]=useState(""); const getBranches=()=>{ axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/branch/', { headers: {"Access-Control-Allow-Origin": "*"}, }).then((res)=>{ setBranch(res.data.branch_name); }); }; const { isEmpty, totalUniqueItems, updateItemQuantity, items, removeItem, totalItems, cartTotal, } = useCart(); const delivery=cartTotal+2.5; const VAT=parseFloat(delivery*0.05).toFixed(2); const totalAmount=parseFloat(delivery+VAT).toFixed(2); if(isEmpty) return

Your Cart is Empty

return(

Shopping Cart

You have {totalItems} in your shopping cart

{items.map((item) =>

{item.name}

{item.arab}

  • {item.quantity}*{item.name} —
)}

Choose

Delivery

Dine In

Takeaway




00:00

Payment Summary

Items Price Total: {cartTotal}BD

Delivery Fee: {delivery}BD

VAT Fee: {VAT}BD

Your Final Amount is: {totalAmount}BD

)} export default Cart;
